content.p: Associate Professor of Law; Divisional Director of Accounting, Finance and Law, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr Mohammad Rizal Salim researches on the regulation of corporations, with focus on comparative corporate governance and the intersection of regulation and the markets. Dr Rizal sits as a member of editorial board committee/subject editor of The Malaysian and Comparative Law Journal and All Malaysia Commercial Reports and has served as a committee member at the Malaysian stock exchange. A corporate lawyer prior to the academia, Dr Rizal serves as Divisional Director for Accounting, Finance and Law, and legal advisor of NUBS.
